title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into The Best of The Herd Podcast! Colin pays his respects to the late great John Madden telling a story about his love for football. The biggest NFL QB move this season proves the Rams made the right move going all in for Matt Stafford. Baker Mayfield receives death threats at home, but this could lead to the freedom Baker and the Browns both want. Plus, Eic Shanks - FOX Sports CEO joins Colin to reminisce his friendship with Madden and the effect his life has on sports for generations to come!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
